backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (UserProfile, FileMetadata, TransferRecord, AIProcessingResult) and backend API methods for user profiles, file uploads, transfers, and AI processing with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two implemented features—a dedicated `/receive` route with full-screen QR scanner and updating TransferHistory to navigate to that route—to their relevant source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing component responsibilities, prop signatures, and notable bug fixes across the React application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors, borders, charts, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React app with PWA meta tags, viewport settings preventing user scaling, manifest and icon links, and a root div for mounting the app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA web app manifest for 'Offline File Sharing' defining icons, display mode, theme color, and shortcuts for Transfer, History, and Online Users tabs.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache versioning, network-first strategy for API calls, cache-first strategy for static assets, and background sync support for failed transfers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up TanStack Router with routes for `/`, `/menu`, `/profile`, and `/receive` (ReceivePage), handling authentication state, onboarding, service worker registration, and orientation lock.
frontend/src/components/AIFeatures.tsx: React component providing AI-powered features: client-side image compression with quality slider and file recognition simulation, with options to share the compressed result.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavBar.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with four tabs (Transfer, History, Users, AI) that triggers haptic feedback on tab change.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionStatus: Fixed top banner that shows online/offline status, appearing when connectivity changes and auto-hiding 3 seconds after coming back online.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty-state UI component displaying an image, title, description, and an optional action button.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React class-based error boundary that catches runtime errors and renders a fallback card with Retry and Go to Home buttons.
Bottom-sheet context menu for a transfer record offering Download, Share (via Web Share API), and optional Delete actions.
frontend/src/components/FileTransfer.tsx: Main file transfer component that lets authenticated users select a file, choose an online recipient, and send it via the ICP actor, with QR code and network-warning dialogs.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer bar displaying the app name and copyright year.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky top header showing the app logo, a loading spinner for in-flight requests, a theme toggle, and a menu button that navigates to /menu.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Full-screen login page with the app logo, branding, and an Internet Identity sign-in button that shows a spinner while authenticating.
frontend/src/components/NetworkWarningDi: An alert dialog component that warns users about uploading files on slow or metered network connections, displaying file size, connection type, and potential risks with Cancel/Upload Anyway actions.
frontend/src/components/OfflineFileShare: An empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingTutori: A multi-slide onboarding dialog with swipe gesture support that introduces users to QR sharing, file transfers, and AI features, with navigation controls and skip functionality.
frontend/src/components/OnlineUsers.tsx: Displays a list of currently online users with avatars, names, and online status indicators, supporting pull-to-refresh and showing an empty state when no users are present.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: A profile setup screen that prompts new users to enter a display name and saves it via the backend, calling an onComplete callback on success.
frontend/src/components/QRCodeDialog.tsx: A dialog that generates and displays a QR code for sharing a file transfer session, with a 5-minute countdown timer and expiry/error states.
A dialog that presents a received file's details (name, size, sender) after scanning a QR code, allowing the user to download the file with haptic feedback and success state handling.
frontend/src/components/QRScannerModal.t: A full-screen modal component that activates the device camera to scan QR codes, parses the payload into a session ID, fetches the associated transfer record from the backend, and calls a success callback.
frontend/src/components/ReceivedDownload: Displays a scrollable list of files received by the current user, with per-item download buttons, long-press context menus, and loading skeleton states.
frontend/src/components/RecentlyReceived: Shows up to five most recently received files for the current user as compact cards with download buttons, with loading skeletons and an empty state.
frontend/src/components/SentDownloadsLis: Displays a list of files sent by the current user, with download buttons, recipient info, long-press context menus, and loading skeleton states.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDownload: A settings section component that renders a header and description for received files, then embeds the ReceivedDownloadsList component.
frontend/src/components/SkeletonCard.tsx: A reusable skeleton placeholder card component with configurable height, used to indicate loading states.
A tabbed view showing sent and received transfer history, with a button to navigate to the QR scan/receive page.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Exports a frozen BRANDING constant containing the app name, acronym, and tagline strings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHapticFeedback.ts: A hook that provides light, medium, and success haptic feedback functions using the Navigator Vibration API, with a flag indicating browser support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInstallPrompt.ts: A hook that captures the browser's beforeinstallprompt event to expose PWA install state and a promptInstall function.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardHandler.ts: A hook that handles mobile keyboard interactions by scrolling focused inputs into view and blurring active elements when tapping outside inputs.
frontend/src/hooks/useLongPress.ts: A hook that detects long-press gestures on touch and mouse events, triggering a callback after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworkInfo.ts: A hook that reads and tracks network connection information (type, speed, data-saver mode) using the Network Information API.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: A hook that manages onboarding visibility state, persisting completion status to localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrientationLock.ts: A hook that locks/unlocks screen orientation to portrait mode using the Screen Orientation API, persisting the preference in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/usePullToRefresh.ts: A hook that implements pull-to-refresh behavior by tracking touch events and triggering a refresh callback when the pull distance exceeds a threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile CRUD, file upload/download, and AI processing operations via the canister actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequestIndicator.t: A hook that returns a combined loading state by checking if any React Query fetches or mutations are in progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipeBack.ts: A hook that detects a right-swipe gesture from the left screen edge and triggers a navigation callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebShare.ts: A hook that wraps the Web Share API to share files, checking browser support and handling share cancellation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind base/component/utility layers, CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, safe-area utilities, z-index layers, and miscellaneous mobile-focused styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page that renders tab-based navigation (transfer, history, users, ai) driven by URL search params, and manages the user's online/offline status via ICP identity.
frontend/src/pages/MobileMenu.tsx: Slide-in mobile menu component showing user avatar/name with options for profile settings, PWA install prompt, and logout.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile settings page allowing users to edit their display name and orientation lock preference, with save functionality backed by ICP canister queries.
frontend/src/pages/ReceivePage.tsx: QR code scanner page that decodes a session ID from a scanned QR payload, fetches the corresponding transfer record from the backend, and allows the user to download the transferred file.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the PWA service worker (/sw.js) on page load to enable offline support.
Utility that reads bytes from an ExternalBlob, creates a browser Blob, and saves it to the device using saveToDevice.
frontend/src/utils/fileSizeValidation.ts: Validates file sizes against 10 MB (warning) and 50 MB (error) thresholds, and provides a formatFileSize helper for human-readable size strings.
frontend/src/utils/qrPayload.ts: Encodes a session ID into a deep-link URL for QR generation and parses QR payloads (URL or raw string) back into session IDs.
frontend/src/utils/receivedDownloads.ts: Provides helpers to format file sizes and timestamps, detect installable file extensions, and filter transfer history records by sender or receiver principal.
frontend/src/utils/saveToDevice.ts: Saves a Blob to the user's device using the File System Access API when available, with a fallback to a traditional anchor-click download.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/src/utils/useOnlineStatus.ts: React hook that tracks and returns the browser's online/offline connectivity status using navigator.onLine and window events.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors (using oklch/hsl CSS variables), typography, spacing, breakpoints, safe-area utilities, and mobile-optimized font sizes.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for 'OFS File Share' describing existing features (dedicated /receive route and QR scanner navigation update) and a pending feature request to open the QR scanner on a new screen when a receiver scans a QR code.
